title: 15 Million Years before the Megalodon, This Giant Ancient Shark Prowled the Oceans
description: A humungous shark that lived 115 million years ago surpassed the size of modern-day great whites, paleontologists discovered

title: The Star of Bethlehem might have actually been a comet described in an ancient Chinese text
description: Many researchers have spent decades attempting to decode biblical descriptions and link them to verifiable historical events. One such description is that of the Star of Bethlehem—a bright astronomical body that was said to lead the Magi to Jesus shortly after his birth.

title: Five lessons about misinformation from ancient Greek and Roman scientists
description: Ancient scientists can be easy to dismiss.

title: INSV Kaundinya Sails On Maiden Overseas Voyage To Retrace Ancient Maritime Routes To Oman
description: The Indian Naval Sailing Vessel Kaundinya, an indigenously built traditional stitched sailing vessel, has embarked on its maiden overseas voyage from Porbandar, Gujarat, to Muscat in the Sultanate of Oman. Prime Minister Narendra Modi congratulated the entire team involved in the project via a social media message. The vessel was formally flagged off by Vice Admiral Krishna Swaminathan, Flag Officer Commanding-in-Chief of the Western Naval Command, in the presence of Issa Saleh Al Shibani, Oman’s Ambassador to India, along with senior Indian Navy officers and distinguished guests. The Indian Navy termed the expedition historic, highlighting it as a milestone in reviving, understanding, and celebrating India’s ancient maritime heritage through a living ocean voyage.#indiannavy #kaundinya #porbandar #muscat #oman #maritimeheritage #oceanvoyage #navalexpedition #traditionalvessel #historicvoyage
